comment: USE THE POWERPOINT SLIDES. This is an open book/note class where your success comes mainly from using the book and powerpoint slides. Repeat: ALWAYS check the slides/book before searching for info online. All the work was straight forward and the class is an easy A if you use the right sources. I unfortunately did not learn that until midterms.

Has the usual workload, but grades very easy. Originally had a group project that he removed. Ended up being graded by a few short papers (like 1-2 pages each), 2 quizzes, and 10 discussions. He also gave an extra credit quiz at the end of the semester. Nice teacher for pretty boring content.
